alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clay; Kanawha; Roane; Wirt (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 11:44AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Calhoun, northeastern Kanawha, southern Wirt, Roane and western Clay Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1143 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Spencer to near Elkview. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spencer, Grantsville, Clendenin, Glen, Elkview, Arnoldsburg, Wallback, Amma, Reedy, Millstone, Procious, Mount Zion, Indore, Left Hand, Lucille, Big Springs, Annamoriah, Harmony, Tariff and Walton. This includes Interstate 79 between mile markers 8 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
